column5: A Happy New Year to all!!!  Just a quick question to see if anyone on the forum has any pointers on where to get Shimano JDM parts?  I have a  2007 TwinPower 6000 and need a front drag knob.  Thanks in advance.
http://www.westernbass.com/forum/bantam1-shimano-usa-stocking-jdm-reel-parts-t86351.html   Just from the limited info on the link you might try Shimano USA? I know it's probably a hassle?
Call aikman in Mississauga he will sort it
http://www.plat.co.jp/shop/catalog/partsorder/language/en/products_id/287/09-TWINPOWER-SW6000HG.html  Plat is best for JDM order.
Thanks guys.  Contacted Plat.  They had entire catalogs online which made it easy!!
